page.title: 17Leisure time in St.Albans.
page.content: We questioned{120}people in our school about what they do in their leisure time.{Everybody}watches{ {television.}"The young ones"is the most popular programme,with 13 votes. Second is"Dungeons and dragons", with 10 votes. Some of the most popular{activities are riding{bikes 46}votes,listening to {music 46}votes,playing with{friends 45 {votes,drawing 40}votes and{reading 33 votes.{32}people play on their {computer}and{25}people play with{lego. Some people also like{sports.}The favourite sport is{football.6}people {play}football,{34}people{watch}it. The next favourite is{badminton.22}people play it but only{5}people{watch}it. Some people go to{clubs. Roller {skating}is the most popular.{15}people go.A close second is{cubs}with{10} people going.
